chapters.title: Chapter 20: From the Stedding
chapters.info: Erith, p. 317 (441)—An Ogier from Stedding Tsofu, daughter of Iva daughter of Alar. She wants to marry Loial, and although he likes her, he is avoiding her because he is convinced she will not want to live a nomadic life such as he needs to lead for the next few years in order to write his book. See also Alar; Iva; Loial.
